ModMetaData.name: Idle Dungeon Looting
ModMetaData.author: AlexNares
ModMetaData.description: There was once an underground civilization living deep below the surface. But they're all gone now. What happened to them? Who knows, but we know one thing: they left a lot of loot down there.\n\nBuild a tunnel leading to a vast network of dungeons hidden below the surface, to scavenge various loot!
